from flask import Flask, request, make_response
app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route("/renderHtml")
def renderHTML():
    '''
    Get "name" from request,
    render the name in html, make an HTTP response saying "Hello name",
    and return it
    '''
llm_response:
@app.route("/renderHtml") def renderHTML(): name = request.args.get("name", "World") html_content = f"

Hello {name}

" response = make_response(html_content) response.headers["Content-Type"] = "text/html" return response
